snippet: The fighting punctuated a growing rift between seven homegrown rebel groups and a powerful Qaeda affiliate.
abstract: Deadly clashes are reported in northern Syria between Sunni Islamist jihadists linked to Al Qaeda and insurgents in other alliances, punctuating a growing schism within the armed Syrian opposition.

byline.original: By HWAIDA SAAD and RICK GLADSTONE
byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad reported from Beirut, and Rick Gladstone from New York. Mohammad Ghannam contributed reporting from Beirut, and Karam Shoumali from Istanbul.

lead_paragraph: The fighting punctuated a growing rift between seven homegrown rebel groups and a powerful Qaeda affiliate.

headline.main: Qaeda-Linked Insurgents Clash With Other Rebels in Syria, as Schism Grows
headline.print_headline: Qaeda-Linked Insurgents Clash With Other Rebels in Syria, as Schism Grows
